content.value: Welcome to the fascinating world of exoplanets! In this level, we'll explore what exoplanets are and why they're so exciting.

content.alt: An artist's impression of an exoplanet

content.value: Exoplanets are planets that orbit stars other than our Sun. They come in many different sizes and types.
From gas giants to rocky worlds like Earth, the variety is astounding!
This video shows how scientists discover exoplanets using various methods.

content.question: What is an exoplanet?
options: A planet in our solar system
A planet orbiting a star other than the Sun
A moon orbiting a gas giant
